about_the_game:
Join the Idle Space Force and take a journey through space to unique 8 bit worlds as you collect enough loot to make your way back home, upgrade your ship, and discover hidden treasure along the way!

Inspired by classic retro games such as Space Invaders and Centipede but with an incremental twist! Life is busy so let the game play itself while AFK and come back to those sweet rewards!

You choose how to play: active or idle and let the ship do the shooting and collect coins for you!

Unlike some incremental games, Idle Space Force has engaging gameplay regardless of play style (incremental or afk or completely offline).

Collect coins, upgrade weapons, fight bosses, seek adventure, join the ISF today!
